channel.title: SkyLearn Test Feed
channel.description: Dynamic test feed for Zapier keyword detection

item.title: British Land relocates HQ to Broadgate
item.description: British Land has completed its move into a new 200,000 sq ft headquarters at 1 Broadgate, consolidating multiple London offices.

item.title: Canary Wharf Group announces new residential development
item.description: Canary Wharf Group has unveiled plans for a mixed-use residential and retail scheme on the South Quay estate.

item.title: Savills reports increased occupier demand in the West End
item.description: Savills says take-up of flexible workspace has grown by 18% year-on-year as companies expand headcount.

item.title: Mace completes fit-out of new HQ for fintech startup
item.description: Construction firm Mace has handed over a 25,000 sq ft fit-out in Shoreditch for a fast-growing fintech firm.

item.title: Landsec launches refurbishment of Victoria office campus
item.description: Landsec begins a major refurbishment of its Victoria campus to deliver sustainable, flexible office space.
